headline: Aon (AON) Revamps Leadership With Key Global Appointments
summary: Aon (AON) recently made significant executive appointments to its Reinsurance division, such as Alfonso Valera and Steve Hofmann taking on pivotal roles to enhance global operations. However, the company's stock remained flat over the last month. This lack of substantial movement aligns with broader market trends characterized by ongoing volatility amidst political tensions surrounding the Federal Reserve. The market was generally flat, with some ups and downs driven by factors such as bank...

headline: NFP acquires Tennessee-based Levine Group
summary: The group's offerings include insurance, employee benefits, retirement plan consulting, and investment management.

content.title: NFP acquires Tennessee-based Levine Group
content.summary: The group's offerings include insurance, employee benefits, retirement plan consulting, and investment management.

thumbnail.caption: The terms of the deal have not been made public. Credit: JHVEPhoto/Shutterstock.

headline: Aon enhances industry-leading Reinsurance team with executive appointments
summary: Aon plc (NYSE: AON), a leading global professional services firm, today announced the appointments of Alfonso Valera as CEO of International for Reinsurance, responsible for UK, EMEA and APAC, and Steve Hofmann as CEO of Americas for Reinsurance, responsible for North America and Latin America. The firm also announced the appointment of George Attard as Global Head of Strategy for Reinsurance and Tomas Novotny as Chairman of International for Reinsurance.

content.title: Aon enhances industry-leading Reinsurance team with executive appointments
content.summary: Aon plc (NYSE: AON), a leading global professional services firm, today announced the appointments of Alfonso Valera as CEO of International for Reinsurance, responsible for UK, EMEA and APAC, and Steve Hofmann as CEO of Americas for Reinsurance, responsible for North America and Latin America. The firm also announced the appointment of George Attard as Global Head of Strategy for Reinsurance and Tomas Novotny as Chairman of International for Reinsurance.

thumbnail.caption: Aon plc (NYSE: AON) exists to shape decisions for the better — to protect and enrich the lives of people around the world. Through actionable analytic insight, globally integrated Risk Capital and Human Capital expertise, and locally relevant solutions, our colleagues in over 120 countries provide our clients with the clarity and confidence to make better risk and people decisions that protect and grow their businesses. Follow Aon on LinkedIn, X, Facebook and Instagram. Stay up-to-date by visiting Aon’s newsroom and sign up for news alerts here.
